articles.title: Serena Williams loses 2nd-round match in Toronto after indicating playing career is winding down
articles.description: A day after telling the world she is preparing to leave professional tennis, Serena Williams exited the National Bank Open on Wednesday night with a 6-2, 6-4 loss to Belinda Bencic. "I'm terrible at goodbyes," she said, "but goodbye, Toronto!"
articles.content:
TORONTO -- Serena Williams lost her first match since telling the world she is ready to leave professional tennis.
No one knows exactly how many more matches Williams will play before walking away, … [+1797 chars]

articles.title: Tua Tagovailoa's reaction to Miami Dolphins' Tom Brady interest - 'I'm still here ... that's all noise'
articles.description: Asked for his reaction to the Dolphins' interest in Tom Brady, for which the franchise was penalized for tampering with the future Hall of Famer, Tua Tagovailoa said Wednesday: "I'm still here."

articles.author: Courtney CroninESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Chicago Bears remove linebacker Roquan Smith from physically unable to perform list
articles.description: As talk of his trade demand from Chicago swirls around the NFL, the Bears decided to remove linebacker Roquan Smith, 25, from the physically unable to perform list on Wednesday.
articles.content:
LAKE FOREST, Ill. -- The Chicago Bears removed linebacker Roquan Smith from the physically unable to perform (PUP) list on Wednesday, the team announced.

articles.title: Cleveland Browns expect to start Deshaun Watson at quarterback in preseason opener at Jacksonville
articles.description: Cleveland Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson is expected to start Friday's preseason opener against the Jaguars, the team announced Wednesday before boarding a flight to Jacksonville.

articles.title: Al Avila out as vice president, general manager of Detroit Tigers
articles.description: With the team on pace for a sixth consecutive losing season, Al Avila is out as executive vice president and general manager of the Detroit Tigers, it was announced Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Atlanta Braves call up top prospect Vaughn Grissom to majors with Orlando Arcia put on IL
articles.description: Infielder Vaughn Grissom, the top prospect in the Braves' minor league system, was called up to the majors on Wednesday with Orlando Arcia placed on the injured list.
